thread.title: Award Winning Film, "Leaving Circadia," Premieres In August On Movies On Demand On Cable, Through Comcast, Time Warner Cable, Cox, Bright House And Many More
thread.title_full: Award Winning Film, "Leaving Circadia," Premieres In August On Movies On Demand On Cable, Through Comcast, Time Warner Cable, Cox, Bright House And Many More

title: Award Winning Film, "Leaving Circadia," Premieres In August On Movies On Demand On Cable, Through Comcast, Time Warner Cable, Cox, Bright House And Many More
text: Best High-Yielders Award Winning Film, "Leaving Circadia," Premieres In August On Movies On Demand On Cable, Through Comcast, Time Warner Cable, Cox, Bright House And Many More By PR Newswire | 08/04/15 - 09:32 AM EDT Reprint NEW YORK , Aug. 4, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Award-winning feature film, "Leaving Circadia," will be available during August on distributor iN DEMAND's Movies On Demand (MOD) platform, reaching major cable systems across the country including Comcast, Time Warner Cable, Cox Communications, Bright House Networks and many other affiliates. Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150803/254388Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150803/254389 This witty, coming-of-age dramedy, set in Williamsburg, Brooklyn , revolves around the story of New Yorkers on the cusp of their 30's striving to balance their fading dreams with the growing responsibilities of love, life and career. The film was written and directed by first time filmmaker Evan Mathew Weinstein , who moved away from his typical on-camera role as actor and took a post behind the cameras. The film boasts a stellar cast including headlining star Joseph R. Gannascoli ( The Sopranos ) and co-stars Christian Coulson (" Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets") and 2015 Tony AwardÂ® Winner Michael Cerveris . In a recent interview featured on Yahoo Business Journal , Weinstein comments, "Every audience - demographics across the spectrum - has responded positively and with enthusiasm! It's been a true personal joy to travel and meet so many other friendly, talented, and beautiful people. We are truly blessed that it is all culminating with a nationwide cable VOD release in August!""Circadia" has been sweeping the festival circuit by storm, garnering attention and praise from the media and film critics, already winning more than ten awards including: "Director's Choice" at Indie Spirit, the "Verizon People's Choice Award" and "Best Feature" at First Glance. The film recently premiered on May 16, 2015 at the Soho Film Festival in New York and was screened at the Manhattan Film Festival on Tuesday, June 23, 2015 . Press: " Joseph R. Gannascoli shines as the irascible landlord Nat" - IN-FLUX Magazine "Smart, fresh and funny!" - John Hanlon , Rotten Tomatoes "An especially good, rare exception coming-of-age film" - Judy Gelman Myers , Indie wire Awards: Emerge Film Festival, Maine , US 2014 Won , Verizon People's Choice Award
